title: Rescuing Ryan
description: A steamy medical first responder romance...Ryan Reynolds never imagined she'd be taking a job as a sex-free escort when she started nursing school, but with bills piling up and rent looming over, she's forced to take matters in her own hands-even if that means agreeing to the oldest profession. So, what if she's a nursing student by day and an escort by night? She is an independent woman who's determined to pave her own way. During her first day "on the job," Ryan meets Chris, a sexy brooding firefighter licking his wounds after an ego bruising rejection. Chris Thomas is the good guy that always comes in last, but meeting the sexy, intelligent, Ryan is a total game-changer. She is the total package, gorgeous, smart, and not afraid to say what is on her mind. Chris is always is up for a challenge. But will rescuing Ryan be the toughest rescue of his career?Rescuing Ryan was orginally a short story in the Risking Everything: A Steamy Anthology of First Responders. Rescuing Ryan now has over 25,000 more words making it a full length novel.
author: Syd Ryan
